name: Paul Costello
coverLetter: Been trimming off and on for about 4 years. Mainly during October and November. I am an honest person with a strong work ethic and learn quickly. I can work independently as well in a team setting. I took the olcc test and past. I have the certification on my phone but I was not able to send my documents such as my ID because maybe my phone does not have a good enough camara.
